    • simulation

      public boolean simulation​(Coord startC, Coord finalC)
      Simulate a move, to check if a Piece could block a mat
      Parameters:
      startC - Position of the piece to simulate the move
      finalC - Coord of the final position
      Returns:
      if check after the "move" return true, else return false

    • update

      finalC - The final position of the Piece
